text: He priya nabi! Yakhana tomara strilokadera talaka da'o takhana tadera talaka diyo tadera nirdharita dinera jan'ya, ara iddatera hisaba rekho, ara tomadera prabhu allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti karo. Tomara tadera bera kare di'o na tadera thaka-ghara theke, ebam tara'o yena beriye na yaya yadi na tara spasta aslilataya lipta haye thake. Ara egulo'i allah‌ra sima. Ara ye ke'u allah‌ra bidhana langhana kare se to tabe nijera antara‌tmara prati an'yaya kare'i pheleche. Tumi jano na, hayata allah era pare kono upaya kare debena.
